long_description: The Victorinox Dual-Compartment Monosling daypack is ideal for everyday use and features a small, easy-access pocket on the shoulder strap that is large enough to fit an iPhone(R). Large main compartment with zipper closure; large zip front stash pocket with snap cover contains an interior slash pocket. Padded back panel and adjustable shoulder strap maximize comfort. Victorinox Dual-Compartment Monosling is made from durable fabric with an abrasion-resistant ballistic nylon base.
short_description: The Victorinox Dual-Compartment Monosling daypack is ideal for everyday use and features a small, easy-access pocket on the shoulder strap that is large enough to fit an iPhone(R).
